careers.title: Senior Software Engineer
careers.description: Position based in Glen Alen, VA. Design, develop, test and implement applications using Python, Java, SQL, Scala, Apache Spark, Hadoop, Hive, AWS, Jenkins, Azure and Power BI in Windows environment. Gather, analyze requirements, and provide guidance on technical solutions and architecture. Build and manage robust data pipelines using PySpark and Scala Spark in on-premise or databricks cluster. Design and Optimize ETL workflows that interact with various data such as RDS, Snowflake, Oracle and Teradata. Write complex transformations and aggregations using PySpark and Scala Spark. Orchestra workloads on AWS and manage data movement. Develop Power BI reports to visualize processed data and communicate insights. Utilize Oracle, DB2 and MongoDB to design and maintain databases. Require Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Engineering or Technology or Related Field with five years of experience in the job offered or related field. Job requires travel and/or relocation to various unanticipated client sites in the United States. The occupation requires travel only nationally (that is within the United States) every 2-3 months. Mail resume to Global Sumi Technologies Inc, Attn: HR Department,11549 Nuckols Road, Suite B, Glen Allen, VA – 23059.

careers.title: Senior Software Engineer
careers.description: Position based in Glen Allen, VA. Design, develop, test, and implement web applications using Java, VB Script, JavaScript, Git, SVN, Bitbucket, Jenkins, JIRA, UFT, Selenium, Eclipse & HP ALM in Windows environment. Identify, define, and analyze business requirements. Utilize RE Frameworks for developing robotic boots using UiPath to automate business processes. Develop Stored Procedures in SQL to retrieve data. Develop both Regression and Smoke suites and create handoff documents for Test Scripts. Involve in automating end to end business scenarios using UiPath RPA tool. Involve in code and solutions review for code quality improvements. Utilize MS-SQL server to develop and maintain test data automation.  Require Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Engineering or Technology or Related with five years of experience in the job offered or related field. Job requires travel and/or relocation to various unanticipated client sites in the United States. The occupation requires travel only nationally (that is within the United States), every 2-3 months. Mail resume to Global Sumi Technologies Inc., Attn: HR Department, 11549 Nuckols Road, Suite B, Glen Allen, VA – 23059.

careers.title: Senior Software Engineer
careers.description: Position based in Glen Allen, VA.Design, develop, test, and implement web applications using JavaScript, jQuery, JSON, AJAX, JIRA, Bootstrap, Nodejs, GitHub, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Angular, ReactJS, Eclipse in Linux, Unix, and Windows environment. Involve in requirement analysis and build and deploy into the development. Develop user interface using Angular 12 for Single Page Application (SPA) development. Utilize Agile and Scrum methodologies for UI development. Engage in coding, debugging, testing and deployment and architecture in different modules. Perform UI designs for projects and engage in code review on team deliverables. Develop modules to communicate the web API services and consume REST API to exchange information with databases. Utilize Oracle and SQL Server to design and maintain databases. Job requires travel and/or relocation to various unanticipated client sites in the United States. Mail resume to Global Sumi Technologies Inc., Attn: HR Department, 11549 Nuckols Road, Suite B, Glen Allen, VA - 23059.

careers.title: Senior Software Engineer
careers.description: Position based in Glen Allen, VA. Design, develop, test, and implement business applications using Java, J2EE, JavaScript, Spring, Spring Boot, JAX_RPC, SOAP UI, Hibernate, jQuery, AJAX, Angular JS, REST APIs, Clear Case, Maven in Unix, and Windows environment. Analyze user requirements and engage in all phases of SDLC. Convert business requirements into functional requirements to design, develop, test, and deploy features. Maintain source code in Bit Bucket and Bamboo using GIT and automate code deployment process. Implement DevOps platform and CI/CD pipelines. Create modules using Java Streams and Lambdas, Develop Stored Procedures using SQL and automate test cases using regression testing. Utilize Oracle and SQL Server to design and maintain databases. Require Bachelor's Degree or Foreign Equivalent in Computer Science or Mathematics or Engineering or Related with five years of experience in the job offered or related field. Job requires travel and/or relocation to various unanticipated client sites in the U.S. Mail resume to Global Sumi Technologies Inc., Attn: HR Department, 11549 Nuckols Road, Suite B, Glen Allen, and VA - 23059.

careers.title: Senior Software Engineer

careers.title: Senior Software Analyst
careers.description: Position based in Glen Allen, VA. Analyze business requirements to automate processing and enhance existing systems. Design, develop and implement applications and systems using C, C++, JavaScript, PL/SQL, eScript, Smart Script, HTML, Shell Script, Siebel EIM, Siebel, EAI under Unix and Windows environment. Develop and configure screens, views and objects in Siebel CRM to facilitate business process flows. Implement and maintain various Siebel Workflows and develop Integration Interfaces between Siebel CRM and third-party applications. Perform Data Mapping and Data Migration and engage in coding and testing of Siebel tools. Develop SQL scripts for data migration and legacy systems and execute EIM in Siebel. Map systems into various performance databases such as MS-SQL Services and Oracle. Engage un unit, integration and system testing. Require Bachelorâ€™s Degree or Equivalent in Computer Science or Engineering or Related Field with two years of experience in the job offered. Job requires travel and/or relocation to various unanticipated client sites in the U.S. Mail resume to Global Sumi Technologies Inc., Attn: HR Department, 11549 Nuckols Road, Suite B, Glen Allen, VA - 23059.
